thread.title: Dave Chappelle Explains How His Success Became a Trap
thread.title_full: Dave Chappelle Explains How His Success Became a Trap

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Dave Chappelle Explains How His Success Became a Trap
text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
Back in 2005, comedian Dave Chappelle walked away from the spotlight seemingly at the height of his success. Upon leaving his critically-acclaimed sketch comedy show, many of course wondered why. Now in a new interview with CBS, Chappelle provides some insight as to why he had to call it quits. 
To help explain his mindset, Dave referenced an analogy that he came across while watching a nature show. In short, Chappelle felt like he was becoming trapped and subsequently exploited for his talents. 
To hear the explanation from the man himself, press play above. 
Chappelle is, however, back in the limelight, as the comedian has two Netflix specials airing this month.
